GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
riscv: traps: add missing prototype

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit b8e86aef0a601bc9731c38d4a5b3f0ee5aa99b2d, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 31da94c25aea835ceac00575a9fd206c5a833fed. For more details please see the references link.
